title: The American Astronaut
creator_credit: Geoff Tuttle, William Perkins, Robert Lurie, Dawn Weisberg, Joshua Taylor, Commodore Films and BNS Productions
brief_description: Samual Curtis’s first mission in this bizarre science fiction musical comedy requires him to take a cat to a saloon on an asteroid. There, he meets his former dance partner (the Blueberry Pirate) and collects his payment: a device capable of producing a Real Live Girl. Including music by alternative rock group The Billy Nayer Show, this film began life as a live show with a loyal following.
